processingSoftware.softwareName: Isako © - Document Conversion System [DCS]® - BnF ALTO export module
processingSoftware.applicationDescription: Intelligent content detection, conversion and structuring for Books, Dictionaries, Periodicals, Newspapers and Magazines. Document Conversion System DCS®. Keywords : OCR, Mets / ALTO, METAe, Library of Congress, British Library , Bibliothèque Nationale de France
